name: Steps of Healthy Living
description:
Your cowardly nemesis has hit you with the Five Point Palm  Exploding Heart Technique. An ordinary man would die after five steps, but with the cardiovascular strength of four men, you can make it to twenty steps. Take out as many of the assassins as possible before then.

The game was designed with android in mind, but is also playable on PC using the mouse in place of your finger.
